entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whati
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 39. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
